column3: Explain the role of photosynthesis research in confirming the relationship between ATP production and photosynthesis.

Scientists finding out that plants in the sun thrive more than plants indoors confirms that ATP production is linked to photosynthesis. This is because ATP production produces energy, and energy is required for plants to thrive.

I ran an experiment where I compared the height of a plant growing in the sun with one indoors. I found that the plant in the sun thrived more. Since ATP production is energy for a plant, it means that photosynthesis which happens in sunlight is related to ATP production..
